H0.text: In which year was Olaf Palme assassinated and the Chernobyl nuclear power station exploded. 1985

H1.text: In which year was Olaf Palme assassinated and the Chernobyl nuclear power station exploded. 1975

H2.text: In which year was Olaf Palme assassinated and the Chernobyl nuclear power station exploded. 1992

H3.text: In which year was Olaf Palme assassinated and the Chernobyl nuclear power station exploded. 1986

A4.text: On 26 April 1986, the no. 4 reactor of the Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant, located near Pripyat, Ukrainian SSR, Soviet Union (now Ukraine), exploded.
